summary: Adds an extra perk tree to Light Armor skill that benefits unarmored players that will also level the players Light Armor skill.
descriptionHtml:
~~Description~~

This will modify the Light Armor tree to add a second completely new tree to benefit players not using armor (Both clothed and not wearing anything). Fighting while unarmored will allow the player\'s Light Armor skill to level up as well allowing for the perks to have a skill requirement rather than a level requirement. Due to the lack of detailed information on how the armor skills are leveled by default this will cause it to level relative to the damage taken (more damage, faster leveling).

~~Perks~~
None of these perks modify the existing perks and they all remain as is. I put in two versions of this tree that only differ across the first perk. The main one gives damage reduction slightly lower than light armor, the second provides far less damage reduction and is more believable for being unarmored. All perks are only functional while unarmored.

[Hardened Skin] Reduces physical damage taken by: 20/30/40/50/65% or 10/15/20/25/30%. Requires 0/20/35/50/75 Light Armor skill.

[Endurance] Increases carry capacity by: 25/50. Requires 30/40 Light Armor skill and Hardened Skin.

[Feather Fall] Reduces falling damage taken by: 50%. Requires 50 Light Armor skill and Hardened Skin.

[Relaxation] Increases stamina regeneration by: 40%. Requires 45 Light Armor skill and Endurance.

[Free Movement] Increases weapon swing speed by: 20%. Requires 65 Light Armor skill and Relaxation or Feather Fall

[Lightning Reflexes] Gives a 10% chance to negate an attack in combat. Requires 85 Light Armor skills and Free Movement.

~~Updates~~
Fixed the lower armor version not showing up in perk tree. (1.05)

Fixed rank 3 of Hardened Skin linking to the Agile Defense perk. (1.08)
